pages.title: Striped Hyena
pages.text: The striped hyena ($(o)Hyaena hyaena$()) is a species of hyena native to North and East Africa, the Middle East, the Caucasus, Central Asia and the Indian subcontinent.$(br2)It is the only extant species in the genus Hyaena.

pages.title: Striped Hyena
pages.text: Relative Size: ★★☆☆☆$(br2)Active during Nighttime$(br2)1 Colors$(br2)Favourite Food: minecraft:rotten_flesh$(br2)Number of Offspring: 2$(br2)Growth time: 4 Days
